mapper.select: SELECT * FROM stweb.stweb_estimates order by estimate_idx DESC limit #{offset}, 5
SELECT * FROM stweb.stweb_estimates where user_idx = #{user_idx} order by estimate_idx DESC limit #{offset}, 5
SELECT * FROM stweb.stweb_estimate_answers where user_idx = #{user_idx} order by estimate_idx DESC limit #{offset}, 5
SELECT count(*) as cnt FROM stweb.stweb_estimates
SELECT count(*) as cnt FROM stweb.stweb_estimate_answers
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO stweb.stweb_estimates (estimate_title, estimate_picture_path, estimate_content, estimate_date, estimate_address, estimate_answer_count, user_idx) VALUES (#{estimate_title}, #{estimate_picture_path}, #{estimate_content}, #{date}, #{estimate_address}, #{estimate_answer_count}, #{user_idx})

INSERT INTO stweb.stweb_estimate_answers (answer_title, answer_picture_path, answer_content, answer_date, estimate_idx, user_idx) VALUES (#{answer_title}, #{answer_picture_path}, #{answer_content}, #{answer_date}, #{estimate_idx}, #{user_idx})
mapper.update: UPDATE stweb.stweb_estimates set estimate_answer_count = estimate_answer_count + 1 where estimate_idx = #{estimate_idx}
